overview: As President of T3Media, Steve Joanis is responsible for overall operations of the company, including management of its overseas operations. Prior to T3Media, he was the CFO of Ischemia Technologies, a venture-backed medical diagnostic company in Denver. Subsequent to Ischemia, Steve was a venture capitalist, first with Roser Ventures in Boulder, Colorado, and then with Wolf Ventures in Denver. Prior to joining Roser in 1998, he was a management consultant with The LEK Partnership, based first in London and then in Chicago, specializing in mergers and acquisitions. Prior to business school, he was a captain in the army, where he served as a helicopter pilot in several international and domestic assignments, including the Gulf War. Steve has an MBA from Wharton and a BS from the United States Military Academy at West Point.

degrees.institution: United States Military Academy at West Point
